title: BGP switches
extract: BGP (Border Gateway Protocol) is protocol that manages how packets are routed across the internet through the exchange of routing and reachability information between edge routers. ... More often, BGP is used to connect one AS to other autonomous systems, and it is then referred to as an external BGP, or eBGP.Sep 15, 2016
